hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin (PEPE/DOGE) Intraday Volume-Spike Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: When PEPE or DOGE experiences >400% volume spike relative to 24-hour average and price moves >15% in 1 hour during NEUTRAL/BULL regime, fading the move (short if spike up, long if spike down) yields reversion of at least 50% of the spike move within 6 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins exhibit 'pump and dump' patterns where retail-driven volume spikes often exhaust quickly. In non-stress regimes, these exaggerated moves frequently revert as liquidity providers and algorithmic traders take opposite sides.
entry_conditions: PEPE or DOGE 1H volume > 400% of 24H average

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price retraces 50% of the initial 1H spike move
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price continues 25% beyond initial spike move

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: More than 40% of volume spikes continue trending beyond entry threshold in same direction.
